Memory picture

I feel so lucky that I've had chances to master photography by taking pictures of events, weeding, graduation and much more. Friends and families are always there for me supporting my passion and work. Capturing the moment of people's joy is what make me so happy about my work and keek me push to move forward to my photography career.
